name: Copy Web to online_preview

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main

jobs:
  copy-web:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v2

      - name: Copy web to online_preview
        run: |
          cp -R flutter_learning/flutter_learning_playground/web/* flutter_learning/flutter_learning_playground/online_preview/
        working-directory: .

      - name: Commit and push changes
        run: |
          git config --global user.name "GitHub Actions"
          git config --global user.email "dawiz147@gmail.com"
          git add flutter_learning/flutter_learning_playground/online_preview/*
          git commit -m "Update online_preview with web content"
          git push origin online_preview
        working-directory: .
